a North American plant with brightly coloured flowers: Monardas produce colourful flowers in August and September. Monarda is adored by bees because of its aromatic foliage.
More examplesFewer examplesI decided to plant some monardas in the border to add some extra colour.They used to treat headaches with an infusion of crushed monarda leaves in boiling water.Smaller plants such as phlox or monarda only require a stake with a diameter of half an inch.
